name: Herley Snowy Rider
description:
Racing, ride your Herley davidson motor bike with high speed, around highway and nice fantastic snowy environment. Very thrilling and relaxing with some more drifting your bike on highway. Just take your dream Herley davidson motor bike and do your racing.
This is very basic of racing , ride motor cycle game
Features:
- Amazing graphics of Herley davidson motor bike , nice fantastic snowy environment
- Simple controls to control and ride your dream motor cycle Herley davidson on nice environment of fantastic snow mountain
- Gas, break buttons to race your racing , ride Herley davidson motor bike
- Swing your device to control your Herley davidson motor cycle steer
- Automatic gear of your racing , ride Herley davidson motor bike
- Camera button to change your view of racing , ride Herley davidson motor cycle
